text: Korkuyorum Anne! (English title: Mommy, I'm Scared!) is a 2004 Turkish comedy film written and directed by Reha Erdem. An alternate title for the film is İnsan nedir ki? (What is a human anyway?). == Main cast == * Ali Düşenkalkar as Ali * Turgay Aydın as Keten * Şenay Gürler as İpek * Işıl Yücesoy as Neriman * Arzu Bazman as Omit * Köksal Engür as Rasih Category:2004 films Category:2004 comedy films Category:Turkish films Category:Turkish-language films Category:Golden Orange Behlül Dal Jury Special Award winners Category:Films set in Turkey Category:Turkish black comedy films
title: Mommy, I'm Scared
